Rulings.Base:
1. This card's effect is applied at the same time you apply Flip Effects.
2. You still destroy the DARK monster even if its ATK and DEF are higher than "Karakuri Spider".
3. If "Karakuri Spider" attacks "Relinquished", "Relinquished" is destroyed even if it has a monster equipped.
4. If "Karakuri Spider" attacks "Dark Ruler Ha Des", the effect of "Karakuri Spider" is negated.
